DESCRIPTION:
Image with Sato, a mobile environment and visual style for mobile devices. The image supports X11 with a Sato theme, Pimlico applications, and contains terminal, editor, and file manager.
Also includes ptest packages with fast execution times to allow for more automated QA.
Image with Sato support that includes everything within core-image-sato plus meta-toolchain, development headers and libraries to form a standalone SDK.
IMAGE_FEATURES:
splash package-management x11-base x11-sato ssh-server-dropbear hwcodecs
dev-pkgs tools-sdk 	tools-debug eclipse-debug tools-profile tools-testapps debug-tweaks ssh-server-openssh
